description: This file sets up an AI agent with knowledge base, storage, and tools, and demonstrates a sample interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the AI agent that interacts with knowledge, storage, and tools.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class for managing a knowledge base loaded from PDF URLs.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Database class for storing memory in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Class managing the agent's memory system.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Model class representing the Gemini Google model.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Class for storing agent sessions in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools class for performing searches via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database class using pgvector for storage.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
